version_description:
• Ability to save as a copy or version when editing photos
• New 'warm tones' color effect
• More variety in Tintype borders
• New 'shake to randomize' feature when editing

• Brand new analog interface, for more authentic TinType shooting
• Quick pull down "back to camera" gesture from photo library
• New 'TinType' photo album to group all your TinTypes together for quick access
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Fixed a bug causing a crash on launch if Photos access is turned off
• Fixed a bug causing a crash when attempting to edit a photo stored in iCloud
• Other bug fixes and improvements

• Fixed a bug where the capture interface could appear slightly shrunken on iPhone 7 Plus (when using 'zoomed' display mode)
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Optimized for iPhone X/XR/XS/XS Max
• TinType effect remastered! New Portrait Mode support for the most authentic TinTypes ever (supports front and rear cameras on iPhone X devices, rear camera on iPhone 7 Plus and iPhone 8 Plus)
• New 'Dark' effect
• Support for 'tap to focus' to change what is in focus when editing a TinType with depth data
• Easy access to 'portraits' album for editing Portrait Mode shots from the Apple Camera
• New app icon and other user interface refinements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
